-1.title: Episode dated 1 October 2016
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Ooey-Gooey Obsessions
1.plot: Food Network stars reveal their ooey-gooey obsessions. Included: Duff Goldman's favorite banana split; Bobby Flay's favorite masterpiece of meat and cheese; and a bacon mac and cheese burger adored by Robert Irvine.

2.title: Decadent and Delicious
2.plot: Food Network stars talk about dishes that are decadent and delicious. Included: Rachael Ray obsesses over Philly pork; and Anne Burrell craves pizza with her favorite toppings. Also: a chili dog topped with onions and coleslaw; loaded Jersey sliders; a tart apple dessert; the ultimate birthday cake.

3.title: Killer Combos
3.plot: Curtis Stone builds the ultimate sundae; and Carla Hall deconstructs a tower of French toast. Also: mac and cheese waffles; a rich cheesecake from Brooklyn; and a killer meat combo.

4.title: Deep-Fried Delights
4.plot: Deep-fried delights include tacos, donuts, duck-fat fries and bologna. Also: Valerie Bertinelli reveals what saucy ham and cheese creation makes her weak in the knees; and Bobby Flay explains his fondness for a sizzling Big Apple-size steak.

5.title: Tale of Two Sandwiches
5.plot: Food Network stars reveal their best-kept Guilty Pleasure secrets. Discover how Alex Guarnaschelli gets her brunch on with a bacon coffee cake while Rachael Ray and Curtis Stone share gooey, meaty sandwiches.

6.title: You're Bacon Me Crazy
6.plot: In the Season 1 finale, David Alan Grier raves about a Hollywood fried chicken feast; Daphne Brogdon shares memories of a sky-high barbecue meat plate; Bobby Flay offers his thoughts on a tenderloin, topped with crab and butter sauce; Valerie Bertinelli talks about hoecakes and Katie Lee talks about macho nachos.

1.title: Thanksgiving Madness
1.plot: In the Season 2 premiere, favorite Thanksgiving foods include turkey waffles (Guy Fieri); a deliciously decadent cake (Amanda Freitag); a gravy-covered concoction (Joey Lawrence); and an outrageous three-bird feast (Aarón Sánchez).

2.title: Guilty Obsessions
2.plot: Ross Mathews confesses his devotion to a chili-covered pasta dish; Kendra Wilkinson talks about being obsessed with a deep-fried dessert; Graham Elliot admits his cheeseburger addiction; and Duff Goldman explains why he wants to be called Big Poppa.

3.title: Deep-Fried Sweet Tooth
3.plot: Guy Fieri reveals his favorite burrito spot in Las Vegas; and Jaleel White discusses his go-to place for a fried chicken sandwich; Jeff Mauro scales a mountainous ice cream pie.

4.title: Holiday Decadence
4.plot: Favorite holiday treats are revealed by Carla Hall (cannoli); David Arquette and Christina McLarty Arquette (deep-fried turkey); Madison Cowan (prime rib) and Sherri Shepherd (banana pudding).

5.title: Holy Moly Burgers
5.plot: Favorite burgers are revealed, including Duff Goldman (a giant burger with donuts for buns); Gail Simmons (peanut butter and jelly "cruffin"); Anne Burrell (an extreme pork dish); and Michael Symon (the mother of all hot dog).

6.title: Cheesiest and Meatiest
6.plot: Included: Buddy Valastro finds the cheesiest, meatiest cheese-steak in New Jersey; Rocco DiSpirito indulges in mouthwatering fried chicken; Fabio Viviani chows down on a green chili mac and cheese; Marc Summers; Aarti Sequeira'; and Tia Mowry-Hardrict reveals her favorite "explosive" pizza.

7.title: Pig Out!
7.plot: Featured: a favorite fried dessert from Duff Goldman; a burger with a kick from Bobby Deen; a dinner and dessert combo from Salt-N-Pepa; pork chops from Jeff Mauro; chicken fried steak from David Arquette and Christina McLarty; and a meaty breakfast dish from Alex Guarnaschelli.

8.title: Sweet and Salty Addictions
8.plot: Brooke Burke talks about satisfying her sweet tooth; Daphne Brogdon shares her favorite twist on chicken and waffles; Jaleel White has dessert for breakfast; Jet Tila eats a Japanese-style burger in Las Vegas; and Katie Lee reveals the most sumptuous short rib grilled cheese on the West Coast.

9.title: Golden-Fried Deliciousness
9.plot: Ross Mathews talks about getting his Mexican food fix in the California desert; Richard Blais shows off his favorite cheesy apple pie; Joey Lawrence declares his love for a burger from Virginia; Nancy Fuller talks about her love for oyster po'boys; Fabio Viviani likes his spaghetti and meatballs in sandwich form.

10.title: Coast to Coast Indulgences
10.plot: On the West coast, Alfonso Ribeiro talks about a sweet and salty bacon brownie, Gail Simmons offers the scoop on an All-American apple pie with bacon, Amanda Freitag explains a "Squwaking Goat"; and Tia Mowry-Hardrict stops for lobster mac and cheese in New York City. Also: Madison Cowan's favorite fish and chips on the East Coast, a monster submarine sandwich is loved by Guy Fieri.

11.title: Big Game, Big Eats
11.plot: Game-day favorites. Included: Jeff Mauro's Texas-size Bloody Mary; Justin Warner's chocolate ice-cream soda; Graham Elliot's carne asada tacos; Aarón Sánchez's favorite barbecue pork nachos; Judy Greer's pizza indulgence; and Jonathan Bennett's go-to fried food from his hometown in Ohio.

12.title: Chocolate Obsessions
12.plot: Romance and chocolate go together, when Geoffrey Zakarian, Marc Summers, Anne Burrell, Richard Blais and Tia Mowry-Hardrict reveal their sweet chocolate obsessions. Included: a perfectly cooked chocolate soufflé; a tower of chocolate-covered treats; dessert tacos; a mile-high chocolate cake.

13.title: Meat Lover Mania
13.plot: Buddy Valastro reveals his favorite sweet and savory Italian sausage; Ross Mathews serves up information on dessert nachos; Aarti Sequeira explains why she's a fan of a certain sweet and salty biscuit dish; Graham Elliot digs into a giant meaty burger.

1.title: The Deep-Fried!
1.plot: Deep dish pizza in Chicago; chili five ways in Cincinnati; a guilty grilled cheese in Los Angeles.

2.title: Pizza and Pigzilla!
2.plot: Pizza; four-pound pork sandwich; popcorn-topped caramel sundae; chicken and waffles.

3.title: Deep-Fried Decadence
3.plot: Deep-fried Twinkies; pancake lasagna; lamb biscuits; beef ribs; scrapple.

4.title: Cinnamon, Steak and Cake!
4.plot: Buddy Valastro orders a roast beef and mozzarella sub in New Jersey; Sam Champion offers his pick for the happiest birthday cake; Rocco DiSpirito has a taste for spicy Italian sausage in Miami; Alfonso Ribeiro fills up on a delicious steak in Bismo Beach, California.

5.title: Sweet and Savory Confessions
5.plot: Amanda Freitag gets passionate about a fruit meringue pie from Chicago; and Salt-N-Pepa sing the praises of the most decadent coconut bread pudding in New York. Also: Michael Symon desires Cleveland nachos.

6.title: Plead Guilty to Pastrami, Poutine and Pork
6.plot: Jaleel White talks about his craving for a pastrami egg roll in New York City; Joey Lawrence sings the praises of a baked Alaska in Beverly Hills; Fabio Viviani gets his poutine burger fix in Austin; and Jeff Mauro offers up some love for a pork schnitzel sandwich in Chicago.

7.title: Super-Stuffed Gluttony!
7.plot: Included: a Nutella lasagna made in Brooklyn (Geoffrey Zakarian); mac and cheese pizza (Ross Mathews); banana-stuffed French toast in West Hollywood (Tia Mowry-Hardrict); and eggplant parm from New Jersey (Marc Summers).

8.title: Sweet Eats vs. Decadent Treats
8.plot: Jet Tila puts corned beef on his loco moco in Redondo Beach, California; Carson Kressley names his pick for the sweetest cake in California; Kendra Wilkinson reveals her favorite sandwich; and Rocco DiSpirito explains what makes a steak super in his book.

9.title: Splurge with No Regrets
9.plot: Chef Richard Blais orders an authentic Cuban sandwich in Miami, Florida; Ross Mathews shares his love of a sinful biscuit sandwich in Portland, Oregon; and Carnie Wilson sings the praises of a salad made of tater tots in California.

10.title: Bringin' Home the Bacon, Burger and BBQ!
10.plot: Dishes worth ditching a diet for are discussed by Buddy Valastro, who goes to Atlanta for a plate of everything. Also: Daphne Brogdon sings the praises of authentic Italian in Gardena, California; and Alex Guarnaschelli contends that even migas are bigger in Texas.

11.title: Double-Down Chow Down!
11.plot: Celebrity dining secrets include where to get indulgent strawberry shortcake in Brooklyn (Jackée Harry); Bee Sting pizza (Daphne Oz); authentic French toast in Palm Strings, California (Carson Kressley); and fried chicken Benedict in Las Vegas (Jet Tila).

12.title: Fried Fabulous Fun
12.plot: Jeff Mauro goes to St. Louis for his favorite fried ravioli dish; Daphne Oz travels to New Jersey for a skillet-size cookie; and Justin Warner orders some unique enchiladas in Austin, Texas.

13.title: O.M.G. Food!
13.plot: Favorite food confessions from Richard Blais (arepas in Miami); David Arquette and Christina McLarty (fried chicken Parmesan); Anne Burrell (pork ribs in Harlem); and Aarón Sánchez (King Cakes directly from New Orleans).

imdb.plot outline: Your favorite Food Network stars reveal their best-kept, most-intimate, guilty-pleasure secrets for the first time ever! We visit the locations and meet the chefs who make these crazy, ooey-gooey, "I-can't-believe-I'm-eating-this" food masterpieces! From a 24-layer chocolate cake to a mega-bacon cheeseburger to a filet mignon covered in fried oysters, Guilty Pleasures shows off dishes whose very names make your stomach rumble.
imdb.title: Guilty Pleasures
plot: Your favorite Food Network stars reveal their best-kept, most-intimate, guilty-pleasure secrets for the first time ever! We visit the locations and meet the chefs who make these crazy, ooey-gooey, "I-can't-believe-I'm-eating-this" food masterpieces! From a 24-layer chocolate cake to a mega-bacon cheeseburger to a filet mignon covered in fried oysters, _Guilty Pleasures_ (qv) shows off dishes whose very names make your stomach rumble.::Food Network
